properties.displayName: Multiple Failed Logins from Same IP
properties.description: TEST 09292025B Part 2 Detects multiple failed logins from the same IP address within 10 minutes.
properties.query:
SigninLogs 
| where ResultType != 0 
| summarize FailedAttempts = count() by IPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m) 
| where FailedAttempts > 5
